flawed_nl_solution:
Chess players that have never lost to an AI is 40/4 = <<40/4=10>>10 people.
Chess players that have lost to an AI is 40-10 = <<40-10=26>>26 people.
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
